titleStmt.title: Letter from Alberta Deal to Eartha M. M. White. August 27, 1930.
titleStmt.author: Alberta Deal

publicationStmt.p: This document forms part of the project "Editing the Earth M.M. White Collection" at the University of North Florida.

msIdentifier.repository: University of North Florida, Thomas G. Carpenter Library Special Collections and Archives

msContents.summary: Author writes to White to apply her mother for admission into the Old Folk's Home..

objectDesc.p: A single page handwritten from Deal to White, written on 8/27/1930, on her mother's admittence into the Old Folk's Home.

editorialDecl.p: This file was transcribed and encoded according to the editorial criteria of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Collection." Using the various options encoded within <choice> elements, this file enables the viewing of a diplomatic transcription and a regularized reading text.

body.p:
I am making this application
asking permission to enter
my mother in the Old Folks Home.
I promise, as long as I am able
to pay (Fifteen dollars)$15.00.
per month, also furnish her
room bed linen, and other
apparel. I trust you will
accept these terms, and
give the matter your
immediate consideration
and let me hear from
you at once, as I will only
be here a few days., Andand
will be compelled to get my
mother located before leaving.
